law.history: Repealed 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 9. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 11.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Time served in prison and on parole not to exceed the period of the maximum sentence; exceptions; paroled prisoners to be amenable to orders of the board and division; supervision and direction of paroled prisoners; final discharge.
